text: Héctor Benjamín Alterio Onorato (born 21 September 1929) is an Argentine actor. His best known role was in La Patagonia rebelde (The Rebel Patagonia). His voice was used in Ya es tiempo de violencia (1969), an anonymous movie about the Cordobazo riots which took place the same year. ==References== ==Other websites== * Allocine biography Category:1929 births Category:Living people Category:Argentine movie actors Category:Actors from Buenos Aires
title: Héctor Alterio
